title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 4921 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
October 16, 2018
On Tuesday, October 16, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 4921, the “STB Information Security Improvement Act,” which requires the Surface Transportation Board to implement certain recommendations of the Inspector General of the Department of Transportation.
